author: ammulder
msg: Strip spaces from connector config-property-setting values.

author: stas
msg: enclose all occurences of eval_* with ENTER;SAVETMPS;
... FREETMPS;LEAVE; previously things just happened to work, due to
external scopes which was not very reliable and some change could
introduce obsure bugs.

author: stas
msg: in case a native apache response filter is configured outside the
<Location> block with PerlSet*Filter directive, make sure that
mod_perl doesn't try to add it as connection filter (previously was
logging an error like: [error] a content filter was added without a
request: includes)

author: dlr
msg: * xdocs/developer-guide.xml
* docs/developer-guide.html
The init-param/name value in web.xml was "properties" is now
"org.apache.velocity.properties".  See the VelocityViewServlet
<http://jakarta.apache.org/velocity/tools/view/> for the docs.
Issue: http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=14874
Reported by: Paul Lynch
Patch by: Shinobu Kawai

author: dlr
msg: * src/java/org/apache/velocity/runtime/resource/ResourceManagerImpl.java
getLoaderNameForResource(String): Changed variable name to be
self-documenting for the case when a failure occurs when trying to
close the resource's InputStream in the corresponding finally block.
